Oraciones_en_tiempos_verbales.sentence: I am going to the store.
She was reading a book.
They have visited that place before.
We had finished dinner when they arrived.
He will be leaving tomorrow.
I will have completed the task by then.
She reads books every day.
They worked hard yesterday.
He has been working here for 5 years.
I had been waiting for an hour when the train arrived.
We will have been living here for a year next month.
She doesn't like coffee.
I didn't see you at the party.
They won't come to the meeting.
I have not finished my homework yet.
He had not left when I called.
We will not be attending the event.
They will not have completed the project by Friday.
I had been playing for two hours when the power went out.
She hasn't been working recently.
Will you help me?
Did you enjoy the movie?
Are they coming with us?
Have you finished your dinner?
Had you left when I called?
Will he be working tomorrow?
